column4: how can I add  the network manager icon in my deskbar? it does not appear in the add to panel area
it should show up automatically;  ps -A | grep -i network , do you get back NetworkManger ?
thanks I finally found what I was looking for at http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-479157.html
you would change the execution bit on the file,  like:   chmod +x <file> to let anyone execute it, or chmod u+x to allow only you to execute ti
